description:
What would your life be like if you didn't have to worry about money?

Imagine waking up whenever you want, then doing whatever you feel like on that day, no boss to tell you when you can take your lunch break instead you can spend the day as you choose, with friends, hanging out with your kids, topping up your tan on the beach, shopping in the mall you name it.

Imagine no more working for someone else, no more hauling yourself out of bed while it's dark outside to go to a job you hate.

Well, that is how I live, for the last year and a half I have not set an alarm to wake up and each day I decide what I want to do and if I want to go to the beach that day, I do!

I no longer work for someone else, I am no longer told where to sit, what time I'm allowed to eat and how to spend my day, and I no longer have to ask 'is it ok if I take x dates off to go on holiday" if I want to go on holiday tomorrow, I do.

I believe life is too short to spend your days miserable working for someone else and to be worried about money.

This is why I made this practical, bite sized, useable, woo woo at times money mindset for women course, so you can learn to harness the power of your money mindset so you can have a better life, the life that you dream of.

So do any of the below apply to you?

  • Are you over worked and under paid?
  • Do your friends earn more than you even though you are just as intelligent as they are? (if not more)
  • Do you put everything on your credit card and just hope it will all be ok?
  • Are you waiting to win the lottery for everything to be better?
  • Are you earning heaps of money but still have nothing left at the end of the month?
  • Do you wonder where all your money goes?
  • Do you think rich people are different from you? - because they are not, they are no smarter than you, the only difference is their money mindset!

Have you ever been told?

  • We can't afford that
  • It's alright for them they come from a rich family
  • Money doesn't grow on trees
  • It's selfish to want a lot of money
  • You can be rich or happy but not both
  • The rich get richer and the poor get poorer
  • You need money to make money
  • Life is about getting an education then working for someone else until you retire
  • You have to work hard for money

Or do you think the below:

  • I'm not worthy
  • My family has never been rich
  • I am not good enough, pretty enough or skinny enough
  • I don't deserve lots of money
  • The only way I will ever become a millionaire is to win the lottery

This is where I come in, I'm here to tell you that it is all bull sh*t, I'm here to tell you that you can have your cake and eat it too, otherwise why invent cake? I'm here to hold your hand and guide you while you rewrite the hurtful and limiting beliefs you have been taught and that are holding you back and teach you how to get out of the money rut you are currently in.

I'm here to show you there is more to life, I'm here to show you the sky is not the limit only your mind is.

I'm here to help you work out what beliefs are holding you back with my tried and tested models, I have been doing this for a long time (like over 20 years, but don't tell anyone or they might work out how old I actually am), I am OBSESSED with personal development, I devour everything I can get my hands on, I buy everything, I have tried everything I can find, I have joined every group I can, I follow everyone! And yes, I've even walked on fire. 

That sounds exhausting, but this is my passion, this is what lights me up and excites me. I want to help you, I want to pass all my knowledge over to you, I want you to succeed, if you succeed I succeed and more importantly, society succeeds, we are not all here to compete against each other, life is not a Miss World competition, unless I've completely missed something?!? Though that may explain a few things...

Inside you will learn:

  • How to identify your money blocks and remove them FAST
  • How to change your money mindset
  • Why you are not as rich as you should be or want to be right now and what you can do about it immediately
  • An easy mind trick to receive answers to any questions you have
  • A fun easy way to boost your confidence on days when you don't feel like you are good enough
  • An easy trick to ensure you have a good day, every day
  • A powerful, fun way to stop saying NO to money
  • A crazy mind trick to help rewire your brain faster
  • An awesome trick to manifest money for any goal
  • You will also get crystal clear on what you really want
  • And inside is a bonus subliminal mp3 for you to help rewire your brain for lots of money
  • Plus lots more

Though Money Mindset for Women is not for you if you want to make 20k in 20 minutes

Money Mindset for Women is not for you if you want to sit on the coach and wait for money to fall into your lap

Money Mindset for Women is for people who want to create real change in their life

Money Mindset for Women is for people who want to change the way money makes them feel

I'm not going to lie to you there is a lot of work involved, but if you are serious about changing your money mindset AND changing your life then this is the course for you

Come inside and join me to learn how to set your money goals, change your money story, stop getting in your own way and finally start receiving the money that you asked for.

All you need is a pen and paper, yourself, an open mind and to do the work, I have spent over 20 years learning, practicing, tweaking this stuff and it works for me and it will work for you but only if you do the work involved. Commit to doing the work and your life will change for the better!

I can't wait to meet you, so step inside and lets get started!
title: Financial Mindset for Women
